about_the_game:
DEEPLANDERS is a cozy and relaxing, minimalist building game where you must satisfy the needs of the Deeplanders to populate the depths. Explore, build, and decorate your own underground kingdom... and when you're ready, embark on a journey to new, unexplored depths!


These charming characters, the Deeplanders, are eager to colonize the underground realms, but you'll have to satisfy their needs if you want them to keep coming. And not everyone wants the same things, so keeping them all happy won't be easy!


As you build and expand your community, you’ll unlock new areas. Each depth is completed with the arrival of a new King, at which point you can either focus on decorating the surroundings or simply enjoy watching the Deeplanders live their lives.



Conquer each level and get ready to dig even deeper!

In DEEPLANDERS you can:
Build, populate, and decorate incredible underground landscapes.
Play at your own pace, without time pressure.
Feel like a god creating underground communities. :)
Feel like a servant to the demands of the inhabitants. :(
Relax while watching the Deeplanders enjoy life.

DEEPLANDERS does NOT offer:
Leaderboards! There are no points to compete for.
Defeats… here you just play, and as you satisfy the Deeplanders, you advance.
Huge battles… no one dies here!
Mining simulation.
Resource management or microtransactions to get them.
Local or online multiplayer.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
